spec: Also we want to log to a file (as well as the console) for the main app.. actually we want to send debug (and above) to the log file and info and above to the console. Use NestJS normal logging for this.
commitMessage:
Added custom application logger with file and console output

- Created AppLogger class that extends NestJS ConsoleLogger
- Added file logging to logs/app.log with debug and above levels
- Console logging shows info and above levels only
- Added global LoggingModule for dependency injection
- Updated main.ts to use the custom logger
